title: Description of spending in circular flow model

content.question: Which of the following correctly describes spending in a circular flow model?

choices.label: Households hire resources from producers in resource markets.
Households purchase goods and services from producers in product markets.
Households purchase goods and services from producers in resource markets.
Producers hire resources from households in product markets.
Producers sell resources to households in product markets.

content.answer: Households purchase goods and services from producers in product markets.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
